Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.1: Create environments that are healthy, respectful, supportive, and challenging for all children.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.2: Collaborate with professionals and partner with children’s families and communities.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.3: Use systematic observations, documentation, and other effective strategies in a responsible way, in partnership with families, staff and other professionals, to positively influence the development of all children.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.4: Use supportive interactions when working with young children and families.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.5: Design, implement, and evaluate classroom activities that promote positive development and learning for all children.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.6: Respect and abide by the ethical and professional standards required.
